attributes.description: ONE ELDERLY OWNER FROM NEW!! VERY GOOD CONDITION! We at Stander Motors pride ourselves in delivering excellent service. We are a family business that opened our doors in 1989 in Dunnottar, since then we moved our business to Nigel in 1994. Come and visit us on 66 Hendrik Verwoerd Str Nigel and meet our friendly staff. We go the extra mile to give our clients only the best. Contact us: Sales manager: Nico Stander Cell: 0832818539, Salesman: Hennie Bezuidenhout Cell: 0824986428, Stephen Gillmer Cell: 0799974729, Christo Pretorius Cell: 0734876436,
